body_html:
Hi
I am unable to resolve the error. I tried all the things mentioned above, none of them works
Here is the error. I am unable to install.
I tried using

  1. for Windows 10 and Windows Server 2016, CUDA 8
    conda install -c peterjc123 pytorch cuda80

  2. for Windows 10 and Windows Server 2016, CUDA 9
    conda install -c peterjc123 pytorch cuda90

  3. for Windows 7/8/8.1 and Windows Server 2008/2012, CUDA 8
    conda install -c peterjc123 pytorch_legacy cuda80

  4. cleaned cache but nothing resolved the issue.
    I am using windows 7
    please help
    conda install -c peterjc123 pytorch_legacy cuda80
    UnsatisfiableError: The following specifications were found to be in conflict:

  • dlib
  • pytorch_legacy
    Use "conda info " to see the dependencies for each package.
body_text:
Hi
I am unable to resolve the error. I tried all the things mentioned above, none of them works
Here is the error. I am unable to install.
I tried using


for Windows 10 and Windows Server 2016, CUDA 8
conda install -c peterjc123 pytorch cuda80


for Windows 10 and Windows Server 2016, CUDA 9

for Windows 7/8/8.1 and Windows Server 2008/2012, CUDA 8
conda install -c peterjc123 pytorch_legacy cuda80


cleaned cache but nothing resolved the issue.
I am using windows 7
please help
conda install -c peterjc123 pytorch_legacy cuda80
UnsatisfiableError: The following specifications were found to be in conflict:



dlib
pytorch_legacy
Use "conda info " to see the dependencies for each package.
body:
Hi
I am unable to resolve the error. I tried all the things mentioned above, none of them works
Here is the error. I am unable to install. 
I tried using
 1. for Windows 10 and Windows Server 2016, CUDA 8
conda install -c peterjc123 pytorch cuda80

2.  for Windows 10 and Windows Server 2016, CUDA 9
conda install -c peterjc123 pytorch cuda90

3.  for Windows 7/8/8.1 and Windows Server 2008/2012, CUDA 8
conda install -c peterjc123 pytorch_legacy cuda80
 4. cleaned cache but nothing resolved the issue.
I am using windows 7
please help
conda install -c peterjc123 pytorch_legacy cuda80
UnsatisfiableError: The following specifications were found to be in conflict:
  - dlib
  - pytorch_legacy
Use "conda info <package>" to see the dependencies for each package.
